title: Creative Zen Vision :M - Avant Garde with custom 'M'?
content:
Would like the panel to confirm my ID of the interface font used on this device…

detail - [http://www.anythingbutipod.com/archives/images/zen-vision-m/zen-vision-m-screenshots.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20060210094254/http:/www.anythingbutipod.com/archives/images/zen-vision-m/zen-vision-m-screenshots.php)

review - [http://www.anythingbutipod.com/archives/2006/01/creative-zen-vision-m-review.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20060210094254/http:/www.anythingbutipod.com/archives/2006/01/creative-zen-vision-m-review.php)

Cheers, Si
author: sii

comments.content:
Oh my, that’s jarring.

I love the interface screenshots, except for that M! Kinda looks like they flipped a lowercase w and lengthened the legs. But why? Wouldn’t the normal Avant Garde M take up about the same space?

If I were considering a Zen™, that might be one thing that made me not want to buy it. :)

\>How about Century Gothic?

Thanks but the ‘Q’ is definitely wrong.

Cheers, Si
